"This looks like...": "Lost Central's control center... It's the core unit."
"Time to take a look."
"You all can rest for now."
"You guys, from Central. Could you come here a sec?"
"I need a hand here. I'll take care of this terminal..."
"Yes, of course."
"Hmm... The power is all shot. Even the backups."
"Can't do much about that. You can use this battery."
"There's no guarantee it will hold... Ah, the sub-unit still seems to be active."
"Oh, then try using this... Alright, the core system's back on."
"I'll reroute power from the sub to the main... Try safe mode, just in case."
"Good idea... You're pretty good. This is going really smoothly."
"You're not bad yourself."
"Whoa... someone who can understand what Ilma's talking about..."
"That's our Manon. Isn't she great?"
"It's on...!"
"Of course."
"Now, let's see what you're hiding..."
"DOLLS?!"
"We must have also woken them up."
"We'll take care of them."
"I was getting sleepy watching Ilma work..."
